PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Venarius timeless jewel needed (cover pain attunement)
Jewels: Resist or stats if needed, life, mana, movementspeed if you haven't taken damage recently, mana regen while moving
Amulet: Anoint fleetfoot, drop avatar of the hunt+4nodes, take life nodes and movement speed at scion, or extra jewel, or get a good corruption (increased movement speed)
If you hit 45000 eva without jade flask, get a silver flask with movementspeed craft (cinderswallow or rare)
Link phase run with enhance, efficacy, empower, arcane surge if you have spare currency, but not mandatory.
Upgrade gems for more speed.
+2 socket curse gem or temp chain effect enchant on helm for higher budget.
Seven-league step for even higher budget. Downside is low evasion, silver flask with craft + 35% speed boots are still better than jade flask.
Empower on temp chain will reserve too much mana, solstice vigil becomes mandatory.
